items.sentence: Was Tom the one who told you what time the meeting would start?
Tom will be allowed to leave, but the rest of you need to stay.
Typhoon No.11 is moving up north at twenty kilometers per hour.
Statistics show that the population of the world is increasing.
The chameleon changes color depending on where it finds itself.
Since I'd never met Tom before, I didn't know how to treat him.
Tom always calls me by the wrong name, but I never correct him.
Seriously though, episode 21 made me almost cry while laughing.
You don't have to speak so loudly. I can hear you very clearly.
When Tom was in high school, he was often punished for smoking.
